00010 #include <QRegExp>

00012 NameValidator::NameValidator(QObject *parent, bool startNumber):
00013 QRegExpValidator(parent) {
00014 
00015         QRegExp exp;
00016 
00017         // set the validator for name-edit to allow only strings with no
00018         // embedded whitespace characters
00019         if (startNumber) {
00020                 exp.setPattern("^[a-zA-Z:_0-9]+[a-zA-Z0-9-:_-.]*$");
00021         }
00022         else {
00023                 exp.setPattern("^[a-zA-Z:_]+[a-zA-Z0-9-:_-.]*$");
00024         }
00025         exp.setPatternSyntax(QRegExp::W3CXmlSchema11);
00026 
00027         setRegExp(exp);
00028 }

00031 }
